short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for restyling Conor Mcbride’s Marx system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Restyles Conor Mcbride’s Marx system to be easier to read and work with.

Features: 
- Dark Mode
- Clearer divisions between text sections
- Fancy buttons and background
- Fixed alignment bugs.
